about_the_game:
[About the game]

All text in this game was translated by machine translation.
[About the DLC.]

This DLC content is an additional episode of "Sex-Loving Family".
In order to play this DLC, you must have the full version of "Sex-Loving Family" installed on your computer.


[Story]
　Manatsu Hidaka continued with her daily routine, trying to forget what happened at the resort that summer.
She tries her best to make progress with her childhood friend Hiroyuki, but it doesn't work out.
Unable to forget what happened at the resort, Manatsu is unable to have her own sexual desire.
Then she receives a phone call from an unknown number--...



[CHARACTER]

Name: Manatsu Hidaka
Height: 170 cm
Three sizes: 107/60/96
Characteristics: cheerful and fun-loving, Parisian, rough around the edges, actually quite serious.

　Arisa's eldest daughter, she is a fun-loving, quick-witted person, but she gets good grades.
She has many friends, but only her childhood friends know the real her.



Japanese voice recording （※Male characters are not recorded)


◆Game Specifications◆

Novel game that can be read by clicking.
Heroine full voice
CG mode
Scene recollection



◆Content warning◆

This game contains content not suitable for all ages and
may not be suitable for display in the workplace.

game contains nudity or sexual content, violence, sexual assault, sex without consent, and general adult content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.

short_description: After the resort. We will continue to train Manatsu. Manatsu is a game to make her a sex slave of the main character completely. Please enjoy the process of training her little by little.
